item.title: The best e-reader to buy right now
item.description: Editor’s note: Black Friday has begun, and we’re covering the biggest and best deals you can get. Any ebook reader will let you cram a Beauty and the Beast-sized library’s worth of books in your pocket, but so will your phone. An ebook reader offers a more book-like reading experience, with fewer distractions and less eye strain, […]

item.title: Emmanuel Macron veut interdire les smartphones dans les lycées
item.description: Après les collèges, les lycées ? Emmanuel Macron veut y interdire l'usage des téléphones et ce, dès la rentrée prochaine. Même si le dispositif dans les collèges reste difficile à appliquer.

item.description: Editor’s note: Black Friday has begun, and we’re covering the biggest and best deals you can get. And […]

item.title: The best Apple Watch to buy
item.description: Editor’s note: Black Friday has begun, and we’re covering the biggest and best deals you can get. If you have an iPhone, the Apple Watch is the best smartwatch for you. But there was only one Apple Watch when the smartwatch launched in 2015. A decade later, you’ve got three flavors to choose from: the entry-level Watch […]

item.title: The best laptops you can get

It’s likely one of the bigger tech purchases you’ll make, and there are a ludicrous number of models, sizes, form factors, and configurations to pick from. We review and test a wide […]

item.title: Some of our favorite Blu-rays are cheaper than ever during Black Friday
item.description: Sometimes, there’s a little too much emphasis placed on buying big-ticket items during Black Friday. I mean, there’s nothing wrong with big gifts. It’s just that people might forget about the power of a compact stocking stuffer, like a movie. Ah, movies. You know you’re getting one, even when it’s wrapped, simply based on its […]

item.description: Le Black Friday sur les PC portables en tout genre permet de dénicher de vraies bonnes affaires. Ultraportables, PC gamers ou 2 en 1, nous avons sélectionné les offres incontournables de la journée.

item.title: La fin des GeForce « standardisées » ? Nvidia pourrait laisser ses partenaires se débrouiller seuls pendant la pénurie de RAM
item.description: Un informateur bien connu sur Weibo suggère que Nvidia ne s'embarrasserait bientôt plus de vendre ses GPU avec de la mémoire vidéo. Dans le contexte de pénurie actuel de RAM, l'entreprise chercherait désormais à laisser chacun de ses partenaires se débrouiller pour trouver de la mémoire GDDR.

item.title: Sora and Nano Banana Pro throttled amid soaring demand
item.description: If you were wanting some AI-generated fun this holiday weekend, you’ll need to be efficient. Google and OpenAI have cut generation request limits for Nano Banana Pro and Sora, citing overwhelming demand. Bill Peebles, who heads Sora at OpenAI, said free users will have six video generations a day. “Our gpus are melting,” he explained. […]

item.title: The US dodged a bullet this Atlantic hurricane season
item.description: An Atlantic hurricane season defined by political and climate disasters comes to a close on November 30th. It kicked off after DOGE's flurry of slashes to federal agencies. Employees who stayed on endured a tumultuous year, to say the least, at the National Weather Service (NWS). A series of strong storms brewed in the Atlantic […]

item.title: Rivian’s software-powered e-bike won me over with its adaptability
item.description: When Rivian-spinoff Also announced its first electric bike recently, I was stoked - a Rivian in bike form? Yes please! - but also had some doubts. The design was, shall we say, polarizing, and the whole thing was powered by software, which raises the specter of outages, glitches, and other assorted crashes. I could already […]

item.title: Barre de son : Fnac et Darty bradent le vaisseau amiral de JBL et ses enceintes détachables
item.description: C'est probablement la baisse de prix la plus spectaculaire du rayon Audio. La JBL Bar 1300 MK2, le système le plus ambitieux de la marque, passe de 1499 € à 999 €. Une chute de 33 % sur un produit de cette catégorie, c'est rare. Si vous rêvez d'un cinéma privé mais que vous refusez de percer vos murs pour passer des câbles, c'est la solution reine. ...

item.title: Black Friday is officially here, and I've found some stellar HP Omen Max 16 deals to kick it off
item.description: You probably won't find a better deal for a high-end gaming laptop this Black Friday, with the HP Omen Max 16 up to $1,200 off!

item.title: Logitech MX Master 4 : la souveraine des souris sans fil pour travailler chute sous les 100 € pour le Black Friday
item.description: Si vous pensiez qu’une souris, c’était deux boutons et une roulette fatiguée, Logitech est là pour vous rappeler que travailler peut aussi rimer avec confort, précision… et petite promo bien sentie. Pour la Black Friday Week, la MX Master 4 s’offre un nouveau tarif de 128,99 euros à 98,99 euros sur Rakuten. Et votre poignet mérite clairement ce cadeau. ...

item.title: Le site de Baïkonour gravement touché après un lancement ce matin : la Russie peut-elle encore envoyer ses astronautes en orbite ?
item.description: Baïkonour a subi d'importants dégâts après le dernier décollage qui a vu partir la mission Soyouz MS-28 en direction de la station spatiale internationale. Si les passagers à bord sont sains et saufs, le pas de tir est désormais inutilisable.

item.title: How to Measure the Earth’s Radius With Legos
item.description: With just a friend, a phone, and a few Lego bricks, you can accurately measure the size of our planet.

item.title: Money dysmorphia: Why solopreneurs fall prey to the funhouse mirror of finances
item.description: And what they can do about it. I’ve worked for myself for nearly a decade, and in all but one of those years I’ve earned more than the U.K. average salary. Some years it’s been a little more. I’m naturally frugal, and even during the rockiest stretches, there’s always been enough to cover the basics—plus a safety net if I ever truly needed it.

item.title: This fully functional Lego Game Boy is all I want for Christmas
item.description: Lego’s reproduction of the Game Boy is great. Now a retrofit electronics kit makes it perfect. If you loved the Lego Game Boy but couldn’t get yourself to buy it because it was only a display piece that couldn’t play actual Game Boy games, I’ve got great news for you: It’s no longer merely a clever block of bricks.

item.title: Black Friday Live 2025: We're Tracking Discounts, Trends, and More
item.description: Today is finally Black Friday, the biggest and best shopping day of the year. The WIRED Reviews team is tracking trends and discounts live.

item.description: Four of Roborock's best-selling robot floor cleaners and one advanced wet-dry push model are ready to move at unbeatable prices.

item.title: Meta is kicking ChatGPT and Copilot out of WhatsApp – and forcing everyone to use its unpopular AI chatbot instead
item.description: ChatGPT and Copilot will leave WhatsApp in 2026 after Meta banned rival chatbots from its app.

item.title: Sennheiser Momentum 4 Wireless : ce casque Bluetooth est à -53 % pendant le Black Friday
item.description: Avec son autonomie bluffante, et sa réduction de bruit active hyper convaincante, le Sennheiser Momentum 4 Wireless est l'un des casques Bluetooth que l'on recommande sans souci. D'autant plus qu'il est, pendant ce Black Friday, affiché à 164,99 euros au lieu de 349,90 euros chez Rakuten.

item.title: Europe tops the charts in digital security – but the UK might be quickly falling behind, says Surfshark
item.description: Surfshark’s Index indicates the UK is lagging behind Europe on digital security, and the gap could deepen even further next year. This Black Friday VPN deal can help you get ready for the fallout.

item.title: Le véritable Black Friday démarre fort : voici le TOP 50 des meilleures offres pour le jour J
item.description: Entre les offres en avant-première, les promos du 11.11 ou encore la Black Week, le mois de novembre a été assez mouvementé en offres. Mais, ce n'est pas fini : le Black Friday débute officiellement ce vendredi avec de nouvelles offres dans sa besace. Nous avons fait le tri des meilleures promotions Tech, faites vous plaisir !
